app.name: Lookup File Manager
app.description: Interface for configuration lookup files in Grail

scopes.name: storage:logs:read
scopes.comment: Read access to logs stored in Grail for DQL queries

scopes.name: storage:buckets:read
scopes.comment: Read access to Grail buckets for querying files

scopes.name: storage:files:read
scopes.comment: Read access to lookup files in Resource Store

scopes.name: storage:files:write
scopes.comment: Write access to upload and update lookup files

scopes.name: storage:files:delete
scopes.comment: Delete access to remove lookup files
